description: PRO5TEMPLATE files are used to maintain settings of a slide so you can create slides that are identical and access a customized slide at a later date. PRO5TEMPLATE files can be saved in a bundle file, which is the .PRO5TEMPLATEBUNDLE .
To create a PRO5TEMPLATE, select the template icon from the toolbar at the top of the window, choose "New Template," name there file, and click Save .
